text: The Taming of the Shrew is a 1967 movie based on the play of the same name by William Shakespeare. The movie was directed by Franco Zeferelli. It stars Richard Burton and Elizabeth Taylor. Much of the play's dialogue was cut. Critics liked the movie. Category:Movies based on plays by William Shakespeare Category:1967 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Italian romance movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Franco Zeffirelli
title: The Taming of the Shrew (1967 movie)
